commit.message:
Rollup merge of #105715 - estebank:unsatisfied-bounds-label, r=compiler-errors

Do not mention long types in E0599 label

The type is already mentioned in the main message and the list of unmet bounds.

Rollup merge of #105715 - estebank:unsatisfied-bounds-label, r=compiler-errors

Do not mention long types in E0599 label

The type is already mentioned in the main message and the list of unmet bounds.
